abstract: Paul Allen, who left Microsoft earlier for treatment of Hodgkin’s disease, now has non-Hodgkins lymphoma.
snippet: Paul Allen, who left Microsoft earlier for treatment of Hodgkin’s disease, now has non-Hodgkins lymphoma.
lead_paragraph: Paul Allen, a private investor and co-founder of Microsoft, has been told he has non-Hodgkin’s lymphoma, according to an e-mail message sent to employees of his investment firm, Vulcan.

headline.main: A Co-Founder of Microsoft Has Lymphoma
headline.print_headline: A Co-Founder Of Microsoft Has Lymphoma
